alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pearl River County through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Mcneil, or 8 miles south of Poplarville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Pearl River County. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
